page.title: 05My Weekend
page.content: SATURDAY. I get up at 08.00, dress and have breakfast.I watch Saturday Superstore on the television,then I do my violin and piano practice.After lunch if I don't go shopping with my mother,I play on the computer for a while then go out for a ride on my bike.After supper I might watch television before going to bed at about 21.30. SUNDAY. I get up at 09.30 and dress in my Sunday (best) clothes.After breakfast I go to church.The children leave the service and go to Sunday School,then we go back in for the end of the service.I go home for a Sunday lunch of roast beef,roast potatoes,cauliflower and white sauce.I do my violin and piano practice again then go out for a game of football until supper time.I play on the computer until bedtime.
